segments.text: We have to pick up Conrad before the party .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Alright , no problem .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We're supposed to meet him at Cal's Bar at 10
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Wait a minute . Cal's bar ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's a gay bar .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , it is . Conrad is gay . Didn't you know ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I thought he was maybe gay , but I wasn't sure.Anyhow , you don't expect me to go into a gay bar , do you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why not ? We're supposed to meet him there .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why doesn't he meet us outside ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why should he do that ? It isn't illegal for us to go in .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , but who wants to go in ? I'm not gay , you know . Why should I go in a gay bar ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You sound like you're afraid .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I just wouldn't be comfortable .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You've never been in a gay bar before ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , never .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But it's just a bar . There's no danger.You shouldn't be so homophobic .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well ...
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Listen . If you refuse to go in , Conrad will be offended.You don't hate gay people , do you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , I don't . But I never went into a gay bar before .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don't worry about it . There is nothing strange about it.If Conrad's there , we'll leave for the party.If he's not , we'll sit down and have a drink .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Okay . I will try it . I suppose it isn't reasonable for me to refuse to go in.After all , gay people aren't afraid to go into normal bars .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm glad you feel that way.We ' ll leave in about ten minutes , alright ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Fine .
segments.speaker: S2
